info.description: This is the description of the hipstapas API. You can find out more at [https://hipstapas.dev](https://hipstapas.dev). You can find the documentation at [https://hipstapas.dev/docs](https://hipstapas.dev/docs).
info.title: hipstapas.dev

tags.name: wordlist
tags.description: Generate passphrases using the EFF wordlists

get.description: The default value for all boolean parameters is `true`. The default value for `lengthMin` is 16 and for `lengthMax` is 32. If `resultsCount` is set to 1, then the content type is set to `text/html`. If `resultsCount` is set to more than 1, then the content type is set to `application/json` and the result is a json array holding all generated passwords.

parameters.name: alphabetSmall
parameters.description: If set to `true` the generation alphabet contains small characters: `abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz`

parameters.name: alphabetCapital
parameters.description: If set to `true` the generation alphabet contains capital characters: `ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ`

parameters.name: alphabetNumber
parameters.description: If set to `true` the generation alphabet contains numbers: `0123456789`

parameters.name: alphabetSpecial
parameters.description: If set to `true` the generation alphabet contains special characters: `.,+-*/!?;:{}()[]%$&~#@|`

parameters.name: lengthMin
parameters.description: Defines the minimal length of the generated phrase

parameters.name: lengthMax
parameters.description: Defines the maximal length of the generated phrase

parameters.name: resultsCount
parameters.description: Defines how many results should be generated at once

200.description: OK. Validation errors are returned as string response.

parameters.name: resultsCount
parameters.description: Defines how many results should be generated at once

200.description: OK. Validation errors are returned as string response.

get.description: The default value for `words` is 6 - a newly generated passphrase contains 6 words (as described and suggested by EFF https://www.eff.org/de/dice)

parameters.name: words
parameters.description: Defines the count of the words per passphrase

parameters.name: resultsCount
parameters.description: Defines how many results should be generated at once

200.description: OK. Validation errors are returned as string response.

parameters.name: min
parameters.description: Defines the lower bound of the number generator

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Defines the upper bound of the number generator

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: If set to `true` the generated number sequence is sorted

parameters.name: noDuplicates
parameters.description: If set to `true` the generated number sequence contains only unique numbers

parameters.name: resultsCount
parameters.description: Defines how many results should be generated at once

200.description: OK. Validation errors are returned as string response.
